# C(8)

| x | 0 | 0 | 0 | 0 | 0 | 0 | 0 |
|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|
| x | x | x | x | x | x | x | x |


# $C(2)^3$

| x | 0 | 0 | 0 | 0 | 0 | 0 | 0 |
|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|
| x | o | o | o | x | o | o | o |
| x | o | x | o | x | o | x | o |
| x | x | x | x | x | x | x | x |


# $C(2) \times C(4)$

| x | 0 | 0 | 0 | 0 | 0 | 0 | 0 |
|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|
| x | o | o | o | x | o | o | o |
| x | x | x | x | x | x | x | x |


# $C(2) \rtimes C(4)$

| x | 0 | 0 | 0 | 0 | 0 | 0 | 0 |
|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|
| x | o | o | o | x | o | o | o |
| x | x | x | q | x | q | x | x |

# Criss group

| x | 0  | 0 | 0 | x | 0 | 0 | 0  | x | 0 | 0 | 0  | x | 0  | 0 | 0 |
|---|----|---|---|---|---|---|----|---|---|---|----|---|----|---|---|
| Q | xx | x | x | Q | x | x | xx | x | x | Q | xx | x | xx | Q | x |

Or

| x | 0  | 0 | 0 | x | 0 | 0 | 0  | 0 | 0 | x | 0  | 0 | 0  | x | 0 |
|---|----|---|---|---|---|---|----|---|---|---|----|---|----|---|---|
| x | xx | x | x | x | x | x | xx | x | x | x | xx | x | xx | x | x |
